methods.name: calculateDirectPath
methods.description: Taking as argument a fully unblocked walking matrix, this method finds a direct path from point A to B.

methods.name: calculateDynamicPath
methods.description: Puts everything together: merges the paths from/to the centre of the ports, with the path calculated around other elements.

methods.name: calculateLinkStartEndCoords
methods.description: Using @link{#calculateDirectPath}'s result as input, we here determine the first walkable point found in the matrix that includes blocked paths.

components.name: DefaultLabelStoryComponent
DefaultLinkComponent
components.templateData:
<!-- Label Host -->
<ng-template #labelLayer></ng-template>

<svg class="link-container">
  <!-- Link -->
  <g [id]="id">
    <path
      [attr.stroke-width]="width"
      [attr.stroke]="selectColor() | async"
      [attr.d]="selectPath() | async"
      class="default-link"
      (mouseleave)="setHovered(false)"
      (mouseenter)="setHovered()"
      [ngClass]="{ hovered: selectHovered() | async }"
    ></path>
    <path
      class="default-link"
      (mouseleave)="setHovered(false)"
      (mouseenter)="setHovered()"
      [attr.stroke-width]="20"
      [attr.stroke]="selectColor() | async"
      [attr.stroke-linecap]="'round'"
      [attr.data-linkid]="id"
      [attr.stroke-opacity]="(selectHovered() | async) ? '0.1' : '0'"
      [attr.d]="selectPath() | async"
    ></path>
  </g>

  <!-- Points -->
  <g *ngFor="let point of getPoints(); trackBy: trackByPoints" [id]="point.id">
    <circle
      fill="currentColor"
      [attr.cx]="point.selectX() | async"
      [attr.cy]="point.selectY() | async"
      r="5"
      class="default-point"
      [ngClass]="{ hovered: point.selectHovered() | async }"
    />
    <circle
      [attr.data-pointid]="point.id"
      [attr.data-linkid]="id"
      (mouseleave)="point.setHovered(false); setHovered(false)"
      (mouseenter)="point.setHovered(); setHovered()"
      [attr.cx]="point.selectX() | async"
      [attr.cy]="point.selectY() | async"
      r="15"
      [attr.opacity]="0"
      [ngClass]="{ selected: point.selectSelected() | async }"
    />
  </g>
</svg>
